If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** v9.2.23-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Unable to validate in Prod **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-1142/folder/13176692/41236750/933086514 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** ndk.2303+new233@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Windows 11 Home/Chrome **App Component:** User Settings ## Action Performed: Preconditions: Create new account with a workspace; add a bank account to WS (using Plaid with account 1111) 1. Open https://staging.new.expensify.com/ 2. Navigate to Wallet page 3. Create a non-US bank account 4. Create an US bank account (using Plaied with account 0000) ## Expected Result: New US personal account has a default badge ## Actual Result: New US personal account does not have default badge. The badge is on Business account added in precondition. If we make other personal account as default, we can not make the Business account default again. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/15808328-85fc-4cab-90dd-a174822fc157 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

labels.name: External

labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** v9.2.23-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/folder/13176877/test-cases/41237356 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** applausetester+jarpatt@applause.expensifail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** MacBook Air M2 macOS 26.0.1 **App Component:** Workspace Settings ## Action Performed: Preconditions: Expensifail account with no workspace and self DM set 1. Create a manual expense in the self DM 2. On the actionable whisper options of the expense, click on Share it with your accountant 3. Select an accountant 4. Enter a merchant, category and create the expense ## Expected Result: User is able to see only the expense transferred to the newly created workspace without any extra actionable whisper message appearing at the top. ## Actual Result: After creating the expense, it is moved to the newly created workspace. However, a message from Concierge appears at the top with actionable whisper options: Submit to someone, Categorize it, Share it with my accountant, Nothing for now. Below that message, the expense report from the transferred expense is displayed. When the user clicks any of the actionable whispers (except Nothing for now), an error occurs and the expense cannot be moved. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/37eee5da-b4f3-441d-ac4e-52ab72e4ac78 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

body:
If you haven���t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.23-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-1145/folder/13176670/41237099/933089558 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** ibellicotest+1886@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Motorola MotoG60 / Android 12 / Chrome ( mWeb / Hybrid app) - Windows 11 / Chrome **App Component:** Search ## Action Performed: Prerequisite: Account has at least two workspaces. 1. Open the Expensify app. 2. Open any workspace chat. 3. Create a manual expense. 4. Navigate to another workspace chat. 5. Create a new report, but don´t submit any expense to it. 6. Return to first workspace chat. 7. Open the expense created in it. 8. Tap on report field and select the report created on step 5. 9. Once the expense was moved, return to LHN. (Don´t open second workspace chat yet) 10. Tap on the search icon on the top right corner. 11. Note that preview of workspace where the expense was moved, still displays "Owes 0,00" in it. ## Expected Result: Workspace chat preview, should display the correct expense amount on "Search" after moving an expense to it. ## Actual Result: Workspace chat preview, still displays "Owes 0,00" on preview on "Search" after an expense is moved to a report in it. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2507b91a-6a97-48c3-b65d-94442612e694 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
